overview: Follow twin sisters and first-time filmmakers Meaghan and Marie Wright, and indigenous activist Joseph Huyer as they set out to learn more about using business as a force for good. The trio drives across the country sharing stories of citizens and business owners adding a different type of value to the world through social enterprise. Hilarious, informative and heartfelt, this is a journey that will leave viewers ready to contribute to making the world a more inclusive and sustainable place.
title: The Social Shift
